## AABB.equalsTo() method

Check if the AABB is close enough to another AABB.

**Signature:**

```typescript
equalsTo(other: AABB, epsl?: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  other | [AABB](doc/markdown/./base.aabb.md) | The AABB to be compared with. |
|  epsl | number | _(Optional)_ The epsilon for comparison. |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the comparison error is less than epsl, otherwise false.
